amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception from the provisions of the bill for any claim brought by a gun owner seeking monetary relief involving the defective design or manufacturing of a firearm.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 232 (Roll no. 25).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 232 (Roll no. 25).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Deutch.
